title: All Skins In Marvel Rivals One-Year Anniversary Event
description: By     James Carr   on November 28, 2025 at 10:22AM PST                                GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases...
body:
By 
    James Carr
   on November 28, 2025 at 10:22AM PST    
          
                  GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.
                Marvel Rivals is celebrating its one-year anniversary with a three-week-long event running through mid-December. During the event, there are tons of skins that are going to be available for purchase, along with a couple of free skins, like one for Jeff the Land Shark. There are a handful of skins available at the start of the event, with more teased for the coming weeks.Available right now, you can grab Gummy Surprise Venom and Restful Recovery Blade from the shop. The Venom bundle is 2,200 Units and the Blade bundle is 1,600 Units, or you can get them together in a mega bundle for 2,800 Units. Each bundle includes the skin, MVP highlight, emote, spray, and nameplate. Both skins are temporary additions to the shop, leaving shortly after the event ends in late December.As part of the Jeff's Break Time event pass, you can get the legendary Business Shark skin for Jeff for free by completing matches. This skin has customizable parts, like ties, glasses, and even his suit design. If you get the premium version of the pass, it also includes the Dad-tastic Reed Mister Fantastic skin and Disappearing Dessert Invisible Woman skin. There's also a new look for Galacta, which can be seen in the battle pass menu. Jeff's Break Time ends at the same time as the anniversary event, although purchasing the premium version will allow you to unlock rewards past the event's scheduled end.While there are certainly a few surprises coming, we do know that there are two more Legendary skins coming. On December 5, Van Dyne's shop opens, containing the legendary Daring Daifuku Psylocke skin. On the same day, a legendary Luna Snow skin will also be released, although it's unclear if that will be in the typical shop or tied to a specific event. Below you can see every skin released for Marvel Rivals anniversary event so far.Business Shark - Jeff the Land SharkDad-tastic Reed - Mister FantasticDisappearing Desserts - Invisible WomanGummy Surprise - VenomRestful Recovery - Blade

title: Lego Star Wars 1,555-Piece Imperial Star Destroyer Gets Big Discount At Amazon
description: GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through...
body:
GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.
  
    
              
          
                                                                                                                                                               Amazon has added one of the most popular Lego Star Wars ships available today to its Black Friday Lego sale. The 1,555-piece Imperial Star Destroyer is on sale for $120 (was $160) while supplies last. This Star Destroyer launched last August as part of the Lego Star Wars 25th Anniversary collection. It comes with seven minifigures, including a 25th Anniversary minifigure of Cal Kestis from Respawn's Star Wars Jedi series.The Imperial Star Destroyer is based on the ship from the opening chase scene of Star Wars: Episode IV: A New Hope. Once fully constructed, the Star Destroyer measures 18 x 11.5 x 6 inches.It's rather fitting that Amazon added the Star Destroye to its Black Friday sale, because Star Wars fans can also get the Lego version of the ship Darth Vader and his crew were chasing: Princess Leia's Tantive IV. The 654-piece Tantive IV display model is 50% off at Amazon and Walmart. You could pair both of these ships with Lego's Boarding the Tantive IV diorama, which is on sale for $38.49 (was $55) and depicts what happens after the Star Destroyer catches the Tantive IV. It's also worth noting Lego's 630-piece midi-scale model of Darth Vader's Executor Super Star Destroyer from Return of the Jedi is on sale for $40 (was $70) at Walmart.Lego Star Wars: Best Black Friday DealsImperial Star Destroyer (1,555 pieces) -- $120 ($160)Executor Super Star Destroyer Model (630 pieces) -- $40 ($70)Battle Droid with STAP (1,088 pieces) -- $90 ($140)Tantive IV Starship Model (654 pieces) -- $40 ($80)  Also at WalmartBoarding the Tantive IV Diorama (502 pieces) -- $38.49 ($55)  Also at WalmartThe Imperial Star Destroyer has only ever received discounts during major sales events like Prime Day and now Black Friday. Previous deals sold out fast.                                 Lego Star Wars Imperial Star Destroyer (1,555 pieces)                                                                $120 (was $160)                                                                                                                                                                                    The Lego Star Destroyer features a buildable handle that can fold out of the spacecraft when you want to take it for a spin, spring-loaded shooters in case you come across any Rebel Alliance scum, and easy access to its internal components. The interior features a bridge, a command room, and a break room, allowing you to recreate several scenes from A New Hope. title: God Of War 20th Anniversary Retrospective Deluxe Box Set Is Over 50% Off
description: GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through...
body:
GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.
  
              
          
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   God of War fans can get the new 20th Anniversary Retrospective Box Set for all-time low prices thanks to Amazon's Black Friday Lightning Deals. Published by Dark Horse in July with a $100 retail price, the two-volume hardcover set is up for grabs for only $55. Alternatively, you can get the fancier God of War 20th Anniversary Deluxe Box Set with two lithographs and premium flourishes for $93.54 (was $200).The anniversary celebration continued last month with the God of War 20th Anniversary DualSens Controller, which is part of PlayStation's Black Friday sale and is discounted to only $64 (was $85) at Walmart.God of War: 20th Anniversary Retrospective$55 ($100)God of War: 20th Anniversary RetrospectiveAcross its two hardcover books, the God of War: 20th Anniversary Retrospective features 320 pages of artwork, behind-the-scenes materials, and exclusive interviews with key members of each game's development team. Both hardcovers and the ornate slipcase are wrapped in leatherette.Volume 1: Greek Saga covers the original God of War Trilogy and its numerous spin-offs, while Volume 2: Norse Saga details the development of God of War 2016 and God of War: Ragnarok. The 20th Anniversary Retrospective was written by Rick Barba, the author behind God of War: Lore and Legends, a recreation of Atreus' journal published by Dark Horse in 2020.                                                                                                                                               God of War: 20th Anniversary Retrospective - Deluxe Edition$93.54 ($200)God of War: 20th Anniversary Retrospective Deluxe EditionThe Deluxe Edition has a few upgrades and additional materials that will likely appeal to collectors and massive God of War fans. Both books have gilded page edges, ribbed spines, slightly different cover art, built-in ribbon bookmarks, and a display box with unique gold-foil illustrations on the front and back.The Deluxe Edition also comes with a bifold portfolio containing a pair of lithographs. One of the prints features artwork inspired by the PlayStation 2 games, and the other is based on the contemporary reboot.More God of War BooksGod of War BooksGod of War fans can also save big on official art books for the 2018 reboot and its sequel, God of War Ragnarok. The series has also received a few novelizations and a humorous ABC storybook for adults titled God of War: B is for Boy.The Art of God of War (Hardcover) -- $27 ($50)The Art of God of War Ragnarok (Hardcover) -- $25 ($50)The Art of God of War Ragnarok: Deluxe Edition (Hardcover) -- $57.22 ($130)God of War: The Official Cookbook (Hardcover) -- $11.89 ($40)God of War: B is for Boy: An Illustrated Storybook -- $17God of War (2005): Novelization -- $15 ($16)God of War II (2007): Novelization -- $17God of War (2018): Novelization -- $17                                Lexar Play Pro 1TB MicroSD Express For Switch 2 Gets Black Friday Discount                         DualSense Limited Edition PS5 Controllers On Sale For Black Friday                         Check Out Over 200 Nintendo Switch Game Deals For Black Friday                                   + Show More More Gaming, Tech, and Entertainment Deals & Preorders Links (5)                 Eight Nintendo Switch Exclusives Are 50% Off In Walmart's Black Friday Sale                         The First PS5 Pro Deal In Six Months Is Up For Grabs For A Limited Time                         Ghost Of Yotei PS5 Slim Bundles And Collector's Edition Get Huge Discounts                         Save Big On 8BitDo's Stellar Ultimate 2 Controllers In Amazon's Black Friday Sale                         Evercade Retro Handhelds & Cartridges Get Rare Price Cuts In Amazon's Black Friday Sale
